prompt:
Please share your thoughts on why some people are able to learn foreign languages much more quickly than others. What factors do you think contribute most to this difference?
When it comes to learning a new language, there are numerous variables at play that can impact one’s progress. Some factors include prior linguistic experiences (such as being bilingual), exposure to foreign cultures and languages through travel or media consumption, the individual’s motivation level for learning the language, and even their aptitude for memory retention.
